tit.e: Fuji Matsuri (a festival of Japanese wisteria)
Fuji Matsuri (a festival of Japanese wisteria)
Fuji Matsuri (a festival of Japanese wisteria)

sen.j: 藤まつり（ふじまつり）は日本各地で行われている祭り。
sen.e: Fuji Matsuri is a festival being held in various regions in Japan.
Fuji Matsuri is a festival being held in various regions in Japan.
Fuji Matsuri is a festival being held in various regions in Japan.

sen.j: 主として藤の名所で行われる祭りで、時期も藤の見ごろである4月下旬～5月上旬に行われる。
sen.e: Generally it's a festival being held in Japanese wisteria-viewing spots, and it takes place at the best time to view the wisteria, from late April to early May.
Generally it is a festival being held in Japanese wisteria-viewing spots, and it takes place at the best time to view the wisteria, from late April to early May.
